pr_title: Add debug expression evaluation support for equality and type check expressions

timeline.message: Add minor fix for typdesc value presentation
Add evaluation support for deep value and reference equality expressions
Add tests for typeof and equality expressions
Add minor change for json type
Update for recent compiler API changes and add spotbugs fixes
Update for recent compiler API changes and add spotbugs fixes

timeline.bodyText: Can these be private? These are used only within the EvaluationUtils class right?
timeline.author: Ibaqu

replies.bodyText: @Ibaqu These are being used outside of the class (inside the debugger evaluation engine implementation). FROM_STRING_METHOD and FOR_NAME_METHOD constants are used only inside the class and hence declared as private.
